admissionSteps.title: Application Form Submission
admissionSteps.description: Fill out and submit the admission application form either online or collect it from school office

admissionSteps.title: Document Submission
admissionSteps.description: Submit all required documents along with the application form

admissionSteps.title: Entrance Test
admissionSteps.description: Appear for the admission entrance test (for classes 1-12)

admissionSteps.title: Result Announcement & Fee Payment
admissionSteps.description: Receive admission result and complete fee payment to secure admission

documentRequirements: Birth Certificate (Original + 2 copies) - For all classes
B-Form / Child Registration Certificate (CRC) - For all classes
6 Passport-size photographs (blue background) - For all classes
Previous School Leaving Certificate (if applicable) - For all classes
Previous School Report Card / Transcript - For all classes
Character Certificate from previous school - For Class 1-10
Class 8 Mark Sheet & Certificate - For Class 9-10
Transfer Certificate from previous school - For Class 9-12
Matriculation (Class 10) Certificate & Marks Sheet - For Class 11-12
Migration Certificate (if from other board) - For Class 11-12

eligibilityCriteria.requirement: Passed Matric with minimum 70% in Science subjects
